Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Southbound Reroute near 73rd/Exchange
ShortDescription: Southbound 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted, due to street blockage near 73rd/Exchange.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Exchange, 73rd, Yates, 75th, then resume their normal route on Exchange, due to street blockage near 73rd/Exchange.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Central Park
ShortDescription: #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Columbus and 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Lawndale, 83rd, Columbus. then resume their normal route on 79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near 79th/Central Park.
